sentences.en: "We supply financial information to selected clients," Crook said loftily.
sentences.cn: “我们的金融信息服务对象是经过挑选的客户，”克鲁克傲慢地说道。

sentences.en: Crook liked her well enough, but remained indifferent to her feminine charms.
sentences.cn: 克鲁格还比较喜欢她，只是对她的女性魅力却始终无动于衷。

sentences.en: Don't jerk me around, Mr Crook.
Donaldson was a petty crook with a string of previous offences.
sentences.cn: 唐纳森有一系列小的犯罪前科，但没犯过大事。

sentences.en: He crooked his finger: "Come forward," he said.
He demanded an apology from me for calling him a crook.
sentences.cn: 我骂他骗子,他要我向他认错.

sentences.en: I'll get her to marry me, by hook or by crook.
sentences.cn: 我要想方设法让她同我结婚.

sentences.en: In his hand, he carried a gold-tipped crook.
sentences.cn: 他手里拿着一根有金制曲柄的手杖。

sentences.en: In his preoccupation with Robyn, Crook had neglected everything.
sentences.cn: 克鲁克一心想着罗宾，忽略了其他一切事情。

sentences.en: Incautiously, Crook had asked where she was.
sentences.cn: 莽撞之下，克鲁克问了她当时在哪里。

sentences.en: She carried the parcel in the crook of her arm.
She hid her face in the crook of her arm.
She lay curled up in the crook of his arm.
That salesman is a real crook.
The crooks got away across the park.
sentences.cn: 那些骗子穿过公园跑掉了。

sentences.en: The voice on the line was vaguely familiar, but Crook couldn't place it at first.
sentences.cn: 电话里的声音有点儿熟悉，但是克鲁克一开始想不起来到底是谁。

sentences.en: They intend to get their way, by hook or by crook.
sentences.cn: 为达到目的，他们不择手段。

sentences.en: you’re crook on me because I didn't walk out with you.
sentences.cn: 你对我生气因为我没有和你一起出去。

phrases.tran_cn: (澳／新西兰， 非正式)发脾气

trans.tran_en: the part of your arm where it bends
if you crook your finger or your arm, you bend it
